Being cooped up at the ark was bad enough but to be sneezing his head off a=
nd losing Energon at the same time, that was getting to him.  He  paces bac=
k and forth with a sour puss look on his face, ears back, eyes angrilly nar=
rowed.  He growls as he paces.

" Stupid spider, what I wouldn't do ta spla=
t that pred in a trash compactor, for cooking up this whatever the slag it =
is virus!  Ughhh!  I just wanna get it outa me already so I can help those =
guys out there!  Maan!  Lord Elder, there's gotta be a way ta cure this!  A=
nd I'm tired of sneez'n my tail end off!  AHHHCOOO!"

The force of his snee=
ze sends him into a wall upside down back first.

" Owwwww.."
